title: Banks open despite Public Holiday
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Bank of Sri Lanka informed that all licensed banks will remain open on Monday (11) and Tuesday (12) as usual.
However, the Ministry of Public Services recently declared Monday (11) & Tuesday (12) as special public holidays.
Secretary to the Ministry of Public Service, J.J Ratnasiri said that the special holidays were given due to the Sinhala & Tamil New Year.
